channel.title: RuneScape Remake
channel.description: Over the days I've been bored and wanting to do a good project. So I decided I should make a RuneScape Remake. If interested please PM or post your information below. I do have Skype so that can work. Add me "Sky.skype99" I do have a domain already so yeah. Just post what you do and how you would be able to help. This is a Mon/Wed/Fri/Sat/Sun project. I want to try to work on it as much as I can.

item.title: RuneScape Remake
item.dc:creator: @frevea frevea
item.description:
@frevea wrote:

[quote=“scapedef, post:2, topic:478241”][quote author=frevea link=topic=596440.msg4199600#msg4199600 date=1357988340]
Over the days I’ve been bored and wanting to do a good project. So I decided I should make a RuneScape Remake. If interested please PM or post your information below. I do have Skype so that can work. Add me “Sky.skype99” I do have a domain already so yeah. Just post what you do and how you would be able to help. This is a Mon/Wed/Fri/Sat/Sun project. I want to try to work on it as much as I can.
[/quote]
where you from?

frevea i think people`s wanna join but other coders want to know, if you can code?
and add more info like

Name: Saz
Age:16
How long can you code:Items,Objects,Npcs
Time Zone:(UTC-07:00) Mountain Time (US & Canada)
Country: Meridian Idaho
E-Mail/Msn:
Skype:sky.skype99
Are you Serious with the project:I’ve wanted to make a remake for many years now but never had the right developing team. I know I still need to learn much much more. I didn’t post alot of information because I’m extremely new to recruiting developers. I am/will be dedicated to this project because it is a dream of mine to create something of my very own

Ect

*Edit[/quote]

Read full topic
